Hi Louis:
 Do you want just those of polearms, or any?  the message could be read
either way. If any please send your address to me again, and I will
supply you with one. Regards, Arnold


>>> lshobie@... 11/19/04 3:17 PM >>>


Hello there,

I am currently building a few webpages highlighting the works of the 
Kanabo smiths.  I am looking for oshigata, pictures of genuine 
signatures and any other information I can get my hands on.

The pages will be part of my site focusing just on yari and polearms.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Louis Skebo
